scripts.build:
rollup -c && printf "// Build date: $(date)

" | cat - build/shadernavigator/shadernavigator.js > temp && mv temp build/shadernavigator/shadernavigator.js
scripts.build-min:
npm run build && printf "// Build date: $(date)

" > build/shadernavigator/shadernavigator.min.js && google-closure-compiler-js build/shadernavigator/shadernavigator.js >> build/shadernavigator/shadernavigator.min.js
scripts.standalone: rm -rf standalone; mkdir standalone; npm run build; npm run build-min; cp -r ShaderNavigator/* standalone/; rm standalone/js/shadernavigator.*js; cp build/shadernavigator/*.js standalone/js/
